definition: variant of 確|确[que4]/variant of 埆[que4]
(classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)

sentences.english: A breeze sprang up and stirred her short hair, which was certainly whiter than the previous year.
sentences.chinese: 微风起来，吹动他短发，确乎比去年白得多了。

sentences.english: This is very difficult indeed be seen or thought of the scene.
sentences.chinese: 这确乎是很难见过或想到的场景。

sentences.english: Nankai can smoothly carry out frontier research projects, to indeed be a luck.
sentences.chinese: 南开能够顺利开展边疆研究计划，确乎是个机缘。

sentences.english: A breeze came to her and touched her short hair, which seemed more grey than last year.
sentences.chinese: 微风起来，吹动她的短发，确乎比去年白得多了。

definition: high sounding and impractical/high flown nonsense
the wording and purport of what one writes
to trace over/to take a copy (of a calligraphy, a painting etc)/(fig.) to describe/to portray
